abstract.t: This document defines a yang data model for a Filter-based Routing Information Base (RIB) Yang data model. A routing system uses the Filter-based RIB to program FIB entries that process incoming packets by matching on multiple fields (n-tuple) within the packet and then performing a specified action on it. The FB-RIB can also specify an action to forward the packet according to the FIB entries programmed using the RIBs of its routing instance.
